mapper.select: SELECT id as id, record_time as recordTime FROM znzz_waiting_record where machine_id=#{id};

SELECT '等待' as 'name', 'feb501' as color, DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%H:%i:%s') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%H:%i:%s') as end_time, IFNULL(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,start_time,end_time),0) as diff FROM znzz_waiting_record WHERE machine_id=#{machineId} AND DATE(start_time) =CURRENT_DATE AND DATE(end_time)=CURRENT_DATE

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS sTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS eTime, timediff AS td, '#feb501' AS color FROM znzz_waiting_record WHERE machine_id = #{machineId} AND start_time > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 60 MINUTE);
SELECT count(id) FROM znzz_waiting_record WHERE machine_id=#{machineId} AND DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i');
